tree.name: Kevin Durant
tree.tradeDescription: Centerpiece of historic 7-team trade: Rockets sent Green, Brooks, #10 pick and multiple 2nd-rounders to Suns for Durant
tree.note: Two-time Finals MVP joins Houston from Phoenix in first 7-team trade in NBA history

assetsGivenUp.name: Dillon Brooks
assetsGivenUp.note: Signed from Memphis Grizzlies; sent to Phoenix

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 #10 Overall Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Rockets' own lottery pick; used by Phoenix to draft Maluach

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 #31 Overall Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: 2nd round pick sent to Phoenix; used to draft Fleming

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 #41 Overall Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: 2nd round pick sent to Phoenix; used to draft Brea

assetsGivenUp.name: 2026 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Sent to Phoenix as part of Durant trade package

assetsGivenUp.name: 2032 2nd Round Pick
assetsGivenUp.note: Sent to Phoenix as part of Durant trade package
